content: From the article: Trump promised to release his tax return if he ever ran for president. “If I decide to run for office, I’ll produce my tax returns. Absolutely. I would love to do that,” Trump said in 2014. Are we surprised that the known lying liar that tells lies is again a lying liar excuse for a human being? We shouldn’t be. We should, by now, be accustomed to expecting lying lies from that lying liar every time he opens his lying liar excuse for a mouth.
